channel.title: Uncategorized on Battle of Brothers
channel.description: Recent content in Uncategorized on Battle of Brothers

item.title: $7600 on Illustrations
item.description: This expense wasn’t a lump sum payment, but about 10 payments made over the course of a few months. I’m at the end of my original contract with an illustrator, and so far he’s delivered:

item.title: $1829 on Animations
item.description: Two more characters were completed, which brings me to a total of 4 characters. This expense was about $450 more than I had originally budgeted for due to the unexpected time associated with animating weapons. Basically, characters with weapons will cost a little bit more to animate, and I’m fine with that.
